H3.text: what was the most important new religious figure of the new kingdom of ancient egypt. Aten

A4.text: During the reign of Amenhotep IV, the Aten became the sole god of the Egyptian state religion, and Amenhotep IV changed his name to Akhenaten to reflect his close link with the supreme deity.
